verbose_text: Moreover, the CK1gamma2 mediated down-regulation of IRS4 was blocked by BAF1, a lysosome inhibitor, but not by Bortezomib, a proteasome inhibitor, in HEK293T cells, and ubiquitylation of Flag-IRS4 was increased under co-transfection of CK1gamma2 with the K-63 ubiquitin, but not with the K-48 ubiquitin, in HEK293T cells, suggesting that the ubiquitin / lysosome degradation pathway is involved in the decrease of IRS4 by CK1gamma2.
